This is the blog and personal website of Jeff Pollard, a software developer currently living in Seattle, WA. I mostly write ruby, but also dabble in Python and am constantly learning as much as I possibly can about writing software. I also love music, dogs (especially mine), beer and my wonderful girlfriend.

Find me at these lovely online establishments:

About This Site

This site is built using HTML5 and CSS3, assisted by the Jekyl and Compass projects and hosted by Heroku. The source of this site is available on Github.
